# Submissions Directory

This folder contains all submitted project applications for the Global Health Innovation Challenge.

Each application should be a Markdown file named after the project (e.g., `project-name.md`) and must follow the structure in [APPLICATION_TEMPLATE.md](../APPLICATION_TEMPLATE.md).

**Do not edit files in this directory directly.** All submissions must be made via pull requests from forked repositories.

---

*For applicants: please place your completed application file here and open a pull request.*
